subject: Fines (Penalties)
Basketball

College Athletics
Basketball (College)
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. put Georgia Tech on four years of probation and fined it $100,000 for violations in the football and men’s basketball programs.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. put Georgia Tech on four years of probation and fined it $100,000 for violations in the football and men’s basketball programs.
